question: Who has been nominated as the USâ€™s Vice -Presidential Candidate from Republican party?
explanation:
The Republican Party of the United States has formally re-nominated President Donald Trump as the party's Presidential candidate and Vice President Mike Pence as the running mate of the President.
The Presidential Election is to be held on November 3 in the United States. Elected Republican Party delegates from all 50 States of the country polled votes to re-nominate Trump. Democratic party had earlier nominated Joe Biden and Kamala Harris as their nominees of President and VP respectively.
